scripts.format: bunx prettier --write drizzle.config.ts src/db/*.ts src/index.ts scripts/*.ts
scripts.db:migrate: bun run db:ensure-schema && bunx drizzle-kit migrate --config drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:push: bun run db:ensure-schema && bunx drizzle-kit push --config drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:push:reset: bun run db:reset-schema && bunx drizzle-kit push --config drizzle.config.ts
